data.name: meSql.EditValue
data.value:
declare @tbThu table ( NgaythangCT datetime, SoPhieuThu nvarchar(50), Sophieu nvarchar(50), IDkh int, Sotien float, Mucdich nvarchar(500), IDUser int, PhieuTC0 int, PhieuTC1 int, isPhanBo bit, NhanVien int ) insert into @tbThu SELECT NgaythangCT, 'TM '+SoPhieu , PhieuTC1 Sophieu,IDkh,Sotien*TyGia,Mucdich,IDUser,PhieuTC0, PhieuTC1, case when PhieuTC0<>'000000000' then 1 else 0 end isPhanBo ,case when PhieuTC0<>'000000000' then (select IDTakecare from BANGCHAOGIA where Sophieu = PhieuTC0) else (select IDTakecare from PHIEUXUATKHO where Sophieu = PhieuTC1) end NhanVien FROM THU where Mucdich not in (109 ,230)--where PhieuTC0=0 --and month(NgaythangCT)=@Thang and YEAR (NgaythangCT)=@nam UNION ALL SELECT ngaythangCT,'NH '+ SoPhieu ,PhieuTC1 Sophieu, IDKh,sotien*TyGia,Mucdich, IDUser,PhieuTC0, PhieuTC1, case when PhieuTC0<>'000000000' then 1 else 0 end isPhanBo ,case when PhieuTC0<>'000000000' then (select IDTakecare from BANGCHAOGIA where Sophieu = PhieuTC0) else (select IDTakecare from PHIEUXUATKHO where Sophieu = PhieuTC1) end NhanVien FROM THUNH where Mucdich not in (109 ,230)-- where PhieuTC0=0 --and month(NgaythangCT)=@Thang and YEAR (NgaythangCT)=@nam
SELECT *, (LN * HSLNKT) AS LoiNhuanKT, (LN * HSLNKD) AS LoiNhuanKD FROM (SELECT KHACHHANG.ttcMa, tbThu.NgaythangCT AS Ngay, PHIEUXUATKHO .Ngaythang NgayXK, DATEDIFF(DAY, PHIEUXUATKHO.NgayThang, tbThu.NgayThangCT) SoNgay, tbthu.PhieuTC0 , tbthu.SoPhieuThu as SoPhieu, --tbthu.Sophieu as SoPhieuXK, dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu AS SoPhieuXK, dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.SoPhieuCG, dbo.BANGCHAOGIA.MaSoDatHang, PHIEUXUATKHO.CongTrinh, tbThu.Sotien AS Thu, tbThu.isPhanBo, (PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia+PHIEUXUATKHO.Tienthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia) GiaTriXK, dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia AS Tientruocthue, dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Tienthue * dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia AS TienThue, tbThu.Sotien, ISNULL(tb.GiaNhap, 0) AS GiaNhap, dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.tienchietkhau * dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia AS TienChietKhau, (CASE PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE (PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia - ISNULL(tb.GiaNhap, 0) - ISNULL(V_XuatkhoChiphiTM.Chitienmat, 0) - ISNULL(V_XuatkhoChiphiUnc.ChiUNC, 0) - ISNULL(PHIEUXUATKHO.tienchietkhau, 0) / (1 - (CASE WHEN PHIEUXUATKHO.CongTrinh = 0 THEN ISNULL(dbo.tblQuyDoi.HSThuCK, 0.15) ELSE (CASE WHEN BANGCHAOGIA.KhauTru IS NULL THEN 0.15 ELSE BANGCHAOGIA.KhauTru / 100 END) END))) / ((PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue + PHIEUXUATKHO.TienThue) * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia) END) AS TySuatLN, (CASE PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE (PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia - ISNULL(tb.GiaNhap, 0) - ISNULL(V_XuatkhoChiphiTM.Chitienmat, 0) - ISNULL(V_XuatkhoChiphiUnc.ChiUNC, 0) - ISNULL(PHIEUXUATKHO.tienchietkhau, 0) / (1 - (CASE WHEN PHIEUXUATKHO.CongTrinh = 0 THEN ISNULL(dbo.tblQuyDoi.HSThuCK, 0.15) ELSE (CASE WHEN KhauTru IS NULL THEN 0.15 ELSE KhauTru / 100 END) END))) / ((PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue + PHIEUXUATKHO.TienThue) * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia) END) TyLe, tbThu.Sotien * (CASE PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE (PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia - ISNULL(tb.GiaNhap, 0) - ISNULL(V_XuatkhoChiphiTM.Chitienmat, 0) - ISNULL(V_XuatkhoChiphiUnc.ChiUNC, 0) - ISNULL(PHIEUXUATKHO.tienchietkhau, 0) / (1 - (CASE WHEN PHIEUXUATKHO.CongTrinh = 0 THEN ISNULL(dbo.tblQuyDoi.HSThuCK, 0.15) ELSE (CASE WHEN KhauTru IS NULL THEN 0.15 ELSE KhauTru / 100 END) END))) / ((PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue + PHIEUXUATKHO.TienThue) * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia) END) AS LN, isnull((CASE WHEN ISNULL(BANGCHAOGIA.NhanKS, 0) = 1 THEN (PhanBoLoiNhuan.PhuTrachHopDong + ( CASE WHEN ISNULL(BANGCHAOGIA.IDPhuTrachKyHD, BANGCHAOGIA.IDTakeCare) = BANGCHAOGIA.IDTakeCare THEN PhanBoLoiNhuan.XucTienKyHD ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN ISNULL(BANGCHAOGIA.IDPhuTrachCT, BANGCHAOGIA.IDTakeCare) = BANGCHAOGIA.IDTakeCare THEN PhanBoLoiNhuan.PhuTrachQuanLyCT ELSE 0 END) +(CASE WHEN PHIEUXUATKHO.CongTrinh =0 THEN PhanBoLoiNhuan.TongConLai ELSE 0 END) )/ 100 ELSE (PhanBoLoiNhuan.PhuTrachHopDong + PhanBoLoiNhuan.PhuTrachChaoGia + (CASE WHEN ISNULL(BANGCHAOGIA.IDPhuTrachKyHD, BANGCHAOGIA.IDTakeCare) = BANGCHAOGIA.IDTakeCare THEN PhanBoLoiNhuan.XucTienKyHD ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN ISNULL(BANGCHAOGIA.IDPhuTrachCT, BANGCHAOGIA.IDTakeCare) = BANGCHAOGIA.IDTakeCare THEN PhanBoLoiNhuan.PhuTrachQuanLyCT ELSE 0 END)+ (CASE WHEN PHIEUXUATKHO.CongTrinh =0 THEN PhanBoLoiNhuan.TongConLai ELSE 0 END)) / 100 END),0) AS HSLNKD, isnull((CASE WHEN BANGCHAOGIA.CongTrinh = 1 THEN (CASE WHEN ISNULL(BANGCHAOGIA.NhanKS, 1) = 1 THEN (100 - ISNULL(PhanBoLoiNhuan.PhuTrachHopDong, 0)) / 100 ELSE (100 - ISNULL(PhanBoLoiNhuan.PhuTrachHopDong, 0) - ISNULL(PhanBoLoiNhuan.PhuTrachChaoGia, 0)) / 100 END) ELSE 0 END),0) AS HSLNKT, PHIEUXUATKHO.IDTakeCare, NHANSU.Ten AS TakeCare FROM ( select * from( --select -- NgaythangCT, tb.Sophieuthu SoPhieuThu , -- 'PB '+ PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu Sophieu , IDkhachhang IDkh , SoTien, '' Mucdich, PHIEUXUATKHO.IDUser , -- SophieuCG PhieuTC0 ,PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu PhieuTC1 from PHIEUXUATKHO inner join @tbThu tb on (PhieuTC0=SophieuCG or PhieuTC1 =PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu ) and NgayThangCT=(select top 1 NgayThangCT from @tbThu where PhieuTC0=SophieuCG order by NgaythangCT desc ) -- where (( month(NgayThangCT)=@Thang AND Year(NgayThangCT)= @Nam and month(PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang )<=@Thang and year(Phieuxuatkho.NgayThang)<=@Nam) or (month(PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang )=@Thang and year(Phieuxuatkho.NgayThang)=@Nam and month(NgayThangCT)<=@Thang AND Year(NgayThangCT)<= @Nam)) and isnull(Sotien,0)<>0 --isnull(PhanBoTamUng,0) <>0 and --union all select NgaythangCT ,SoPhieuThu , Sophieu , IDkh , Sotien , Mucdich , IDUser , PhieuTC0 , PhieuTC1, isPhanBo from @tbThu where NhanVien=@IDTakeCare -- where PhieuTC0 =0
) tbl ) AS tbThu inner JOIN PHIEUXUATKHO ON tbThu.PhieuTC1 = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu --OR tbThu.PhieuTC0 <> 0 OR tbThu.PhieuTC0 = dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.SophieuCG LEFT JOIN KHACHHANG ON KHACHHANG.ID = PHIEUXUATKHO.IDKhachhang LEFT JOIN NHANSU ON NHANSU.ID = PHIEUXUATKHO.IDTakeCare and( PHIEUXUATKHO.IDTakeCare=@IDTakeCare or @IDTakeCare='') LEFT OUTER JOIN tblQuyDoi ON CONVERT(int, LEFT(dbo.tblQuyDoi.ThangNam, 2)) = MONTH(tbThu.NgaythangCT) AND CONVERT(int, RIGHT(dbo.tblQuyDoi.ThangNam, 4)) = YEAR(tbThu.NgaythangCT) INNER JOIN BANGCHAOGIA ON dbo.BANGCHAOGIA.Sophieu = dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.SophieuCG INNER JOIN BANGYEUCAU ON dbo.BANGYEUCAU.Sophieu = dbo.BANGCHAOGIA.Masodathang LEFT JOIN PhanBoLoiNhuan ON PhanBoLoiNhuan.Thang=Right(Convert(nvarchar,PHIEUXUATKHO.NgayTHang,103),7) AND PhanBoLoiNhuan.CT=PHIEUXUATKHO.CongTrinh --LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.KTPhanBoLoiNhuanCT ON dbo.BANGYEUCAU.IDLoaiYeuCau = dbo.KTPhanBoLoiNhuanCT.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT Sophieu, SUM(ISNULL(gianhap, giaban) * Soluong) AS GiaNhap FROM dbo.View_XuatKhoGiaNhapTB GROUP BY Sophieu) AS tb ON tb.Sophieu = dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu LEFT OUTER JOIN V_XuatkhoChiphiTM ON dbo.V_XuatkhoChiphiTM.Sophieu = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu LEFT OUTER JOIN V_XuatkhoChiphiUnc ON dbo.V_XuatkhoChiphiUnc.Sophieu = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu LEFT OUTER JOIN V_XuatkhoChietkhauTM ON dbo.V_XuatkhoChietkhauTM.Sophieu = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu LEFT OUTER JOIN V_XuatkhoChietkhauUNC ON dbo.V_XuatkhoChietkhauUNC.Sophieu = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu WHERE (BANGCHAOGIA.IDTakeCare=@IDTakeCare or @IDTakeCare='') --and (month(tbThu.NgayThangCT)=@Thang AND Year(tbThu.NgayThangCT)= @Nam and month(PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang )<=@Thang and year(Phieuxuatkho.NgayThang)<=@Nam) or (month(PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang )=@Thang and year(Phieuxuatkho.NgayThang)=@Nam and month(tbThu.NgayThangCT)<=@Thang AND Year(tbThu.NgayThangCT)<= @Nam) ) tb ORDER BY SophieuCG , Ngay asc, NgayXK asc --Bảng dưới
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY HDNhanVIen.ID ORDER BY right(HDNhanVien.ChiTiet,9)) AS STT, HDNhanVIen.ID,NgayBaoCao,NHANSU.Ten AS NhanVien, -- Datediff(day,PHIEUXUATKHO.NgayThang,tbThu.NgayThangCT)SoNgay, PHIEUXUATKHO.SoPhieu, NgayNhapLieu,IdDanhSach,HDTen.Ten AS NoiDungBC, ChiTiet,SoLuong,KhoiLuong, HDNhanVien.Diem, BaoCao, HDNhanVien.PhanHoi, Duyet, IDNhanVien, HDNhanVien.IDUser, YearMonth, Convert(bit,0)Modify FROM HDNhanVien INNER JOIN NHANSU ON HDNhanVien.IDNhanVien=NHANSU.ID INNER JOIN HDDanhSach ON HDDanhSach.ID=HDNhanVien.IDDanhSach INNER JOIN HDTen ON HDDanhSach.IDTen=HDTen.ID LEFT JOIN PHIEUXUATKHO ON PHIEUXUATKHO.SoPhieu=right(HDNhanVien.ChiTiet,9) --LEFT JOIN ( select * from @tbThu where PhieuTC0 =0 ) AS tbThu ON (tbThu.PhieuTC1 = PHIEUXUATKHO.SoPhieu) AND HDNhanVien.KhoiLuong=tbThu.SoTien WHERE IDDanhSach IN (35,36,37,38,39,40) AND month(HDNhanVien.NgayBaoCao)=@Thang AND Year(HDNhanVien.NgayBaoCao)= @Nam )tbl WHERE STT =1 and( IDNhanVien=@IDTakeCare or @IDTakeCare='') ORDER BY SoPhieu

data.name: meSqlCu.EditValue
data.value:
declare @tbThu table ( NgaythangCT datetime, Sophieu nvarchar(50), IDkh int, Sotien float, Mucdich nvarchar(500), IDUser int, PhieuTC0 int, PhieuTC1 int ) insert into @tbThu SELECT NgaythangCT, 'TM '+PhieuTC1 Sophieu,IDkh,Sotien,Mucdich,IDUser,PhieuTC0, PhieuTC1 FROM THU --where PhieuTC0=0 --and month(NgaythangCT)=@Thang and YEAR (NgaythangCT)=@nam UNION ALL SELECT ngaythangCT, 'NH '+PhieuTC1 Sophieu, IDKh,sotien,Mucdich, IDUser,PhieuTC0, PhieuTC1 FROM THUNH-- where PhieuTC0=0 --and month(NgaythangCT)=@Thang and YEAR (NgaythangCT)=@nam
SELECT *, (LN * HSLNKT) AS LoiNhuanKT, (LN * HSLNKD) AS LoiNhuanKD FROM (SELECT KHACHHANG.ttcMa, tbThu.NgaythangCT AS Ngay, DATEDIFF(DAY, PHIEUXUATKHO.NgayThang, tbThu.NgayThangCT) SoNgay, tbthu.Sophieu as SoPhieuXK, --dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu AS SoPhieuXK, dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.SoPhieuCG, dbo.BANGCHAOGIA.MaSoDatHang, PHIEUXUATKHO.CongTrinh, tbThu.Sotien AS Thu, dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Tienthue * dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia AS TienThue, tbThu.Sotien, ISNULL(tb.GiaNhap, 0) AS GiaNhap, dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.tienchietkhau * dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia AS TienChietKhau, (CASE PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE (PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia - ISNULL(tb.GiaNhap, 0) - ISNULL(V_XuatkhoChiphiTM.Chitienmat, 0) - ISNULL(V_XuatkhoChiphiUnc.ChiUNC, 0) - ISNULL(PHIEUXUATKHO.tienchietkhau, 0) / (1 - (CASE WHEN PHIEUXUATKHO.CongTrinh = 0 THEN ISNULL(dbo.tblQuyDoi.HSThuCK, 0.15) ELSE (CASE WHEN BANGCHAOGIA.KhauTru IS NULL THEN 0.15 ELSE BANGCHAOGIA.KhauTru / 100 END) END))) / ((PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue + PHIEUXUATKHO.TienThue) * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia) END) AS TySuatLN, tbThu.Sotien * (CASE PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia WHEN 0 THEN 0 ELSE (PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia - ISNULL(tb.GiaNhap, 0) - ISNULL(V_XuatkhoChiphiTM.Chitienmat, 0) - ISNULL(V_XuatkhoChiphiUnc.ChiUNC, 0) - ISNULL(PHIEUXUATKHO.tienchietkhau, 0) / (1 - (CASE WHEN PHIEUXUATKHO.CongTrinh = 0 THEN ISNULL(dbo.tblQuyDoi.HSThuCK, 0.15) ELSE (CASE WHEN KhauTru IS NULL THEN 0.15 ELSE KhauTru / 100 END) END))) / ((PHIEUXUATKHO.Tientruocthue + PHIEUXUATKHO.TienThue) * PHIEUXUATKHO.Tygia) END) AS LN, (CASE WHEN BANGCHAOGIA.CongTrinh = 1 THEN (CASE WHEN ISNULL(BANGCHAOGIA.NhanKS, 1) = 1 THEN KTPhanBoLoiNhuanCT.PhuTrachHopDong / 100 ELSE (KTPhanBoLoiNhuanCT.PhuTrachHopDong + KTPhanBoLoiNhuanCT.PhuTrachChaoGia) / 100 END) ELSE 1 END) AS HSLNKD, (CASE WHEN BANGCHAOGIA.CongTrinh = 1 THEN (CASE WHEN ISNULL(BANGCHAOGIA.NhanKS, 1) = 1 THEN (100 - ISNULL(KTPhanBoLoiNhuanCT.PhuTrachHopDong, 0)) / 100 ELSE (100 - ISNULL(KTPhanBoLoiNhuanCT.PhuTrachHopDong, 0) - ISNULL(KTPhanBoLoiNhuanCT.PhuTrachChaoGia, 0)) / 100 END) ELSE 0 END) AS HSLNKT, PHIEUXUATKHO.IDTakeCare, NHANSU.Ten AS TakeCare FROM ( select * from( select distinct --(select top 1 NgaythangCT from @tbThu where( PhieuTC0 =SophieuCG or PhieuTC1 =PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu) and ( ( month(NgayThangCT)=@Thang AND Year(NgayThangCT)= @Nam and month(PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang )<=@Thang and year(Phieuxuatkho.NgayThang)<=@Nam) or (month(PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang )=@Thang and year(Phieuxuatkho.NgayThang)=@Nam and month(NgayThangCT)<=@Thang AND Year(NgayThangCT)<= @Nam)) order by NgayThangCT desc ) NgaythangCT, -- case when (month(NgayThang)<@Thang AND Year(NgayThang)<= @Nam) then dateadd(month,@Thang-month(NgayThang), Ngaythang) else Ngaythang end NgaythangCT, 'PB '+ PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu Sophieu , IDkhachhang IDkh , PhanBoTamUng as SoTien, '' Mucdich, PHIEUXUATKHO.IDUser , SophieuCG PhieuTC0 ,PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu PhieuTC1 from PHIEUXUATKHO inner join @tbThu on PhieuTC0=SophieuCG and NgayThangCT=(select top 1 NgayThangCT from @tbThu where PhieuTC0=SophieuCG order by NgaythangCT desc ) where isnull(PhanBoTamUng,0) <>0 and (( month(NgayThangCT)=@Thang AND Year(NgayThangCT)= @Nam and month(PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang )<=@Thang and year(Phieuxuatkho.NgayThang)<=@Nam) or (month(PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang )=@Thang and year(Phieuxuatkho.NgayThang)=@Nam and month(NgayThangCT)<=@Thang AND Year(NgayThangCT)<= @Nam)) and isnull(Sotien,0)<>0 union all select * from @tbThu where PhieuTC0 =0
) tbl ) AS tbThu inner JOIN PHIEUXUATKHO ON tbThu.PhieuTC1 = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu --OR tbThu.PhieuTC0 <> 0 -- OR tbThu.PhieuTC0 = dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.SophieuCG LEFT JOIN KHACHHANG ON KHACHHANG.ID = PHIEUXUATKHO.IDKhachhang LEFT JOIN NHANSU ON NHANSU.ID = PHIEUXUATKHO.IDTakeCare LEFT OUTER JOIN tblQuyDoi ON CONVERT(int, LEFT(dbo.tblQuyDoi.ThangNam, 2)) = MONTH(tbThu.NgaythangCT) AND CONVERT(int, RIGHT(dbo.tblQuyDoi.ThangNam, 4)) = YEAR(tbThu.NgaythangCT) INNER JOIN BANGCHAOGIA ON dbo.BANGCHAOGIA.Sophieu = dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.SophieuCG INNER JOIN BANGYEUCAU ON dbo.BANGYEUCAU.Sophieu = dbo.BANGCHAOGIA.Masodathang LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.KTPhanBoLoiNhuanCT ON dbo.BANGYEUCAU.IDLoaiYeuCau = dbo.KTPhanBoLoiNhuanCT.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT Sophieu, SUM(ISNULL(gianhap, giaban) * Soluong) AS GiaNhap FROM dbo.View_XuatKhoGiaNhapTB GROUP BY Sophieu) AS tb ON tb.Sophieu = dbo.PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu LEFT OUTER JOIN V_XuatkhoChiphiTM ON dbo.V_XuatkhoChiphiTM.Sophieu = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu LEFT OUTER JOIN V_XuatkhoChiphiUnc ON dbo.V_XuatkhoChiphiUnc.Sophieu = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu LEFT OUTER JOIN V_XuatkhoChietkhauTM ON dbo.V_XuatkhoChietkhauTM.Sophieu = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu LEFT OUTER JOIN V_XuatkhoChietkhauUNC ON dbo.V_XuatkhoChietkhauUNC.Sophieu = PHIEUXUATKHO.Sophieu WHERE (month(tbThu.NgayThangCT)=@Thang AND Year(tbThu.NgayThangCT)= @Nam and month(PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang )<=@Thang and year(Phieuxuatkho.NgayThang)<=@Nam) or (month(PHIEUXUATKHO.Ngaythang )=@Thang and year(Phieuxuatkho.NgayThang)=@Nam and month(tbThu.NgayThangCT)<=@Thang AND Year(tbThu.NgayThangCT)<= @Nam) ) tb ORDER BY SoPhieuXK --Bảng dưới
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY HDNhanVIen.ID ORDER BY right(HDNhanVien.ChiTiet,9)) AS STT, HDNhanVIen.ID,NgayBaoCao,NHANSU.Ten AS NhanVien, -- Datediff(day,PHIEUXUATKHO.NgayThang,tbThu.NgayThangCT)SoNgay, PHIEUXUATKHO.SoPhieu, NgayNhapLieu,IdDanhSach,HDTen.Ten AS NoiDungBC, ChiTiet,SoLuong,KhoiLuong, HDNhanVien.Diem, BaoCao, HDNhanVien.PhanHoi, Duyet, IDNhanVien, HDNhanVien.IDUser, YearMonth, Convert(bit,0)Modify FROM HDNhanVien INNER JOIN NHANSU ON HDNhanVien.IDNhanVien=NHANSU.ID INNER JOIN HDDanhSach ON HDDanhSach.ID=HDNhanVien.IDDanhSach INNER JOIN HDTen ON HDDanhSach.IDTen=HDTen.ID LEFT JOIN PHIEUXUATKHO ON PHIEUXUATKHO.SoPhieu=right(HDNhanVien.ChiTiet,9) --LEFT JOIN ( select * from @tbThu where PhieuTC0 =0 ) AS tbThu ON (tbThu.PhieuTC1 = PHIEUXUATKHO.SoPhieu) AND HDNhanVien.KhoiLuong=tbThu.SoTien WHERE IDDanhSach IN (35,36,37,38,39,40) AND month(HDNhanVien.NgayBaoCao)=@Thang AND Year(HDNhanVien.NgayBaoCao)= @Nam )tbl WHERE STT =1 ORDER BY SoPhieu
